title: How to learn to be an tax professional what publications books must I study - Quora

response.answer_text: Classes, not books. Tax law changes yearly and sometimes within the year. You will need updates as well. The Feds require a minimum of 18 hours of credit to get a PTIN number. I found that laughable and try to get 50 or more. Sometimes I feel like that's not enough. A PTIN is required to file returns electronically. We had a preparer come in to us after a community College tax course. They were 2 years behind on tax law.
